verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \add that\add* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w finished|strong="G5055"\w* \w these|strong="G5128"\w* \w sayings|strong="G3056"\w*, he \w departed|strong="G3332"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w coasts|strong="G3725"\w* of \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w* \w beyond|strong="G4008"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitudes|strong="G3793"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*.

¶ The \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w tempting|strong="G3985"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Is \w it|strong="G1487"\w* \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* for a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* to put \w away|strong="G0630"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w for|strong="G2596"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w cause|strong="G0156"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Have ye|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w read|strong="G0314"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w he which made|strong="G4160"\+w* \+add them\+add* \+w at|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the beginning|strong="G0746"\+w* \+w made|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w male|strong="G0730"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w female|strong="G2338"\+w*,\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w said|strong="G2036"\+w*, \+w For|strong="G1752"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w cause|strong="G1752"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2641"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w leave|strong="G2641"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall cleave|strong="G4347"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1135"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w wife|strong="G1135"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w twain|strong="G1417"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w flesh|strong="G4561"\+w*?\wj*

\wj \+w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\+w* \+w they are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w no more|strong="G3765"\+w* \+w twain|strong="G1417"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w flesh|strong="G4561"\+w*. \+w What|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w hath joined together|strong="G4801"\+w*, \+w let|strong="G5563"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w put asunder|strong="G5563"\+w*.\wj*

They \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w did|strong="G1781"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w command|strong="G1781"\w* to \w give|strong="G1325"\w* a \w writing|strong="G0975"\w* of \w divorcement|strong="G0647"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w put|strong="G0630"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w away|strong="G0630"\w*?

He \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w because|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w of the hardness of|strong="G4641"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w hearts|strong="G4641"\+w* \+w suffered|strong="G2010"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w to put away|strong="G0630"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w wives|strong="G1135"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the beginning|strong="G0746"\+w* \+w it was|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w so|strong="G3779"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Whosoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall put away|strong="G0630"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w wife|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w except|strong="G1487"\+w* \+add it be\+add* \+w for|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w fornication|strong="G4202"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall marry|strong="G1060"\+w* \+w another|strong="G0243"\+w*, \+w committeth adultery|strong="G3429"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whoso marrieth|strong="G1060"\+w* \+w her which is put away|strong="G0630"\+w* \+w doth commit adultery|strong="G3429"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w His|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* the \w case|strong="G0156"\w* of the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w be|strong="G2076"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \add his\add* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, it \w is|strong="G4851"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w good|strong="G4851"\w* to \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w All|strong="G3956"\+w* \+add men\+add* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w receive|strong="G5562"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5126"\+w* \+w saying|strong="G3056"\+w*, \+w save|strong="G0235"\+w* \+add they\+add* \+w to whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w it is given|strong="G1325"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w there are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w some|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w eunuchs|strong="G2135"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w were|strong="G1080"\+w* \+w so|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w born|strong="G1080"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+add their\+add* \+w mother’s|strong="G3384"\+w* \+w womb|strong="G2836"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w there are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w some|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w eunuchs|strong="G2135"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w were made eunuchs|strong="G2134"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5259"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w there be|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w eunuchs|strong="G2135"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w have made|strong="G2134"\+w* \+w themselves|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w eunuchs|strong="G2134"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of heaven’s|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w sake|strong="G1223"\+w*. \+w He that is able|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w to receive|strong="G5562"\+w* \+add it\+add*, \+w let him receive|strong="G5562"\+w* \+add it.\+add*\wj*

¶ \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* were there \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* little \w children|strong="G3813"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he should \w put|strong="G2007"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* on \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pray|strong="G4336"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj \+w Suffer|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w little children|strong="G3813"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w forbid|strong="G2967"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*, \+w to come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w of such|strong="G5108"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*.\wj*
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* on \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w departed|strong="G4198"\w* \w thence|strong="G1564"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Good|strong="G0018"\w* \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* good \w thing|strong="G0018"\w* shall I \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I may \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w callest thou|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w good|strong="G0018"\+w*? \+add there is\+add* \+w none|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w good|strong="G0018"\+w* \+w but|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w*, \+add that is\+add*, \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w thou wilt|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w*, \+w keep|strong="G5083"\+w* \+w the commandments|strong="G1785"\+w*.\wj*

He \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Which|strong="G4169"\w*? \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj Thou shalt \+w do|strong="G5407"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w murder|strong="G5407"\+w*, Thou \+w shalt|strong="G3431"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* commit \+w adultery|strong="G3431"\+w*, Thou \+w shalt|strong="G2813"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w steal|strong="G2813"\+w*, Thou \+w shalt|strong="G5576"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* bear false \+w witness|strong="G5576"\+w*,\wj*

\wj \+w Honour|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add thy\+add* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w Thou shalt love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w neighbour|strong="G4139"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w thyself|strong="G4572"\+w*.\wj*

The young \w man|strong="G3495"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w All|strong="G3956"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* have I \w kept|strong="G5442"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w youth|strong="G3503"\w* \w up|strong="G1537"\w*: \w what|strong="G5101"\w* lack \w I|strong="G5302"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w thou wilt|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1511"\+w* \+w perfect|strong="G5046"\+w*, \+w go|strong="G5217"\+w* \+add and\+add* \+w sell|strong="G4453"\+w* \+w that|strong="G5224"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w hast|strong="G5224"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w to the poor|strong="G4434"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thou shalt have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w treasure|strong="G2344"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come|strong="G1204"\+w* \+add and\+add* \+w follow|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*.\wj*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G0191"\w* the young \w man|strong="G3495"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* that \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, he went \w away|strong="G0565"\w* \w sorrowful|strong="G3076"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w possessions|strong="G2933"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w unto|strong="G3101"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \wj \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w a rich man|strong="G4145"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w hardly|strong="G1423"\+w* \+w enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w again|strong="G3825"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w It is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w easier|strong="G2123"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1330"\+w* \+w a camel|strong="G2574"\+w* \+w to go|strong="G1330"\+w* \+w through|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w the eye|strong="G5169"\+w* \+w of a needle|strong="G4476"\+w*, \+w than|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w a rich man|strong="G4145"\+w* \+w to enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, they \w were|strong="G1605"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="G4970"\w* \w amazed|strong="G1605"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G0687"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w beheld|strong="G1689"\w* \add them\add*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w With|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w impossible|strong="G0102"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w all things|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w are|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w possible|strong="G1415"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* have \w forsaken|strong="G0863"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*; \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w shall|strong="G2071"\w* \w we|strong="G2254"\w* \w have|strong="G2071"\w* \w therefore|strong="G0687"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w which have followed|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*, \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the regeneration|strong="G3824"\+w* \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w shall sit|strong="G2523"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the throne|strong="G2362"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1391"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w glory|strong="G1391"\+w*, \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall sit|strong="G2523"\+w* \+w upon|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w twelve|strong="G1427"\+w* \+w thrones|strong="G2362"\+w*, \+w judging|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w the twelve|strong="G1427"\+w* \+w tribes|strong="G5443"\+w* \+w of Israel|strong="G2474"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w one|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w that hath forsaken|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w houses|strong="G3614"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w brethren|strong="G0080"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w sisters|strong="G0079"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w wife|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5043"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w lands|strong="G0068"\+w*, \+w for|strong="G1752"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w name’s|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w sake|strong="G1752"\+w*, \+w shall receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w an hundredfold|strong="G1542"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall inherit|strong="G2816"\+w* \+w everlasting|strong="G0166"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+add that are\+add* \+w first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w last|strong="G2078"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the last|strong="G2078"\+w* \+add shall be\+add* \+w first|strong="G4413"\+w*.\wj*
